name: Furret
flavorText:
It makes a nest to
suit its long and
skinny body. The nest is impossible
for other POKéMON
to enter.

previous.name: Sentret
previous.flavorText:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

next.name: Hoothoot
next.flavorText:
It always stands
on one foot. It
changes feet so fast, the movement
can rarely be
seen.
